str2: When, at which time. From hos and te; at which too, i.e. When.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From epi and ginosko; to know upon some mark, i.e. Recognize; by implication, to become fully acquainted with, to acknowledge.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Contracted from a primary word; soil; by extension a region, or the solid part or the whole of the terrene globe.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To take note of, perceive, consider carefully, discern, detect, make account of. From kata and noieo; to observe fully.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
Apparently a primary word; the bosom; by analogy, a bay.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Sea-coast, (sandy) beach; shore (of sea or lake), land. From aisso and hals (on which the waves dash).

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Singular
Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To deliberate, take counsel, determine. From boule; to advise, i.e. deliberate, or resolve.
Or exotho ex-o'-tho from ek and otheo; to expel; by implication, to propel.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A ship, vessel, boat. From pleo; a sailer, i.e. Vessel.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Optative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
